long_description: If you're a progressing rider who likes to explore the entire mountain, choose versatile and comfortable Ride EX snowboard bindings. Their cushioned bases and flexible highbacks will handle it all. Foundation Chassis are contoured and profiled for lightweight precision; quick-adjust heel-cup design allows micro-adjustments in seconds. Wedgie(TM) 1.5 fixed-position footbeds offer a subtle amount of angle, providing the perfect mix of comfort and lateral support for the advancing rider. ComfortFlex highbacks feature cupped shaping for control and support, and a soft flex up top for comfort and forgiving performance. RAD(TM) ankle straps offer a comfortable fit for all-day shred sessions. Convertible ThinGrip toe straps with lightweight rubber webbing can be worn across the top or over the front of boots to hold you in tight; you can change positions on the fly. Durable aluminum AstroGlyde OG Ratchets buckles. Ride EX snowboard bindings are compatible with Burton The Channel snowboards; disc conversion kit is sold separately.
